description: I will be interning with the Data & Machine Learning Innovation Team at Apple this summer. 🍏
My paper, "Prompts Are Programs Too! Understanding How Developers Build Software Containing Prompts" was accepted to ACM FSE 2025. See you in Trondheim, Norway! 🇳🇴
Our paper on commonsense morality was accepted to Nature Machine Intelligence. 🤖
My paper, "NLPositionality: Measuring Positionality and Design Biases in Datasets and Models in NLP", won an Outstanding Paper Award at ACL 2023. 🏆
My paper, "A Qualitative Study on the Implementation Design Decisions of Developers", won the ACM SIGSOFT Distinguished Paper Award at ICSE 2023. 🏆
